issue.title: [CF 1047] Spell Cast Count suggestion
issue.body:
The conditional "Spell Cast Count" has no easy way to reset the counter.  A checkbox for "reset count on combat ends" would be very helpful to ensure the count doesn't carry over without resetting.


> Posted by CurseForge user John454ss | Imported from CurseForge issue #1047 | Raw

comments.body:
I should actually remove it all together, since using the counter "notification" handler is a much better way to do this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

This condition is now deprecated.

In its place, use a Combat Event icon with a Counter notification handler. Also use counter notification handlers to reset the counter when appropriate (I suggest an On Condition Set Passing trigger to reset it).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
